    • savePositionsToDB

      public boolean savePositionsToDB(List<Position> positions)
      Saves positions to the database. Positions are either inserted as new records or updated if they already exist.
      Parameters:
      positions - The list of positions to save.
      Returns:
      true if the save operation is successful, false otherwise.

      Method, that returns a list of positions that satisfy the given parameters of a pallet.

      weight - The weight of the pallet.
      isTall - The height of the pallet.
      numberOfPositions - The number of positions.
      Returns:

    • getReservedPositions

      public List<List<Position>> getReservedPositions(Customer customer, double weight, boolean isTall, int numberOfPositions)
      Method, that returns all the reserved positions that satisfy the given conditions.
      Parameters:
      customer - The customer for whom positions are reserved.
      weight - The weight of the pallet.
      isTall - Whether the position is tall.
      numberOfPositions - The number of consecutive positions to be selected.
      Returns:
      A list of position sets, each representing a valid selection of reserved positions.

      Parameters:
      positions - The positions reserved by a customer.
      weight - The weight of the pallet.
      isTall - Whether the position is tall.
      Returns:
      A filtered list of positions based on the given conditions.

    • persistMaterialOnPallet

      public void persistMaterialOnPallet(Pallet pallet, Material material, int quantity)
      Method that saves a material on a pallet in the database. If the material is already stored on the pallet, its quantity is updated otherwise, a new entry is created.
      Parameters:
      pallet - The pallet where the material is stored.
      material - The material to be persisted.
      quantity - The quantity of the material to be persisted.

    • getStatistics

      public Map<Date,javafx.util.Pair<Integer,Integer>> getStatistics(Date dateFrom, Date dateTo, String customerName)
      Method, that returns the statistics for the given period of time for a specific customer.
      Parameters:
      dateFrom - The date from which the statistics should be calculated.
      dateTo - The date to which the statistics should be calculated.
      customerName - The name of the customer for which the statistics should be calculated.
      Returns:
      The map of dates and pairs of numbers (number of palets going in and number of palets going out for that date).

    • isPositionReserevedByCustomer

      public boolean isPositionReserevedByCustomer(Date reservedFrom, Date reservedUntil, Position position, Customer c)
      Method that checks if a position is reserved by a customer within a specified time frame.
      Parameters:
      reservedFrom - The start date of the reservation.
      reservedUntil - The end date of the reservation.
      position - The position to check for reservation.
      c - The customer reserving the position.
      Returns:
      true if the position is reserved by the customer within the specified time frame, false otherwise.

    • deleteReservationRecord

      public boolean deleteReservationRecord(Customer customer, Date dateFrom, Date dateUntil)
      Method that deletes a reservation record for a customer within a specified time frame.
      Parameters:
      customer - The customer whose reservation record is being deleted.
      dateFrom - The start date of the reservation.
      dateUntil - The end date of the reservation.
      Returns:
      true if the deletion is successful, false otherwise.

    • getAllUsedPositions

      public List<String> getAllUsedPositions()
      Method that returns all positions currently in use from the database.
      Returns:
      A list containing the IDs of all positions currently occupied by pallets, or null if an error occurs.

    • changeUserActivity

      public void changeUserActivity(int id, String palletFrom)
      Method that updates the activity of a user for a specified pallet.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the user whose activity is being updated.
      palletFrom - The PNR of the pallet for which the activity is being updated.

    • deleteCustomer

      public boolean deleteCustomer(String customerName)
      Method that deletes a customer from the database.
      Parameters:
      customerName - The name of the customer to be deleted.
      Returns:
      true if the deletion is successful, false otherwise.

    • deleteUser

      public void deleteUser(int id)
      Method that deletes a user from the database.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the user to be deleted.

    • deletePallets

      public void deletePallets(Set<String> pnrs)
      Method that deletes pallets from the database.
      Parameters:
      pnrs - A set of PNRs corresponding to the pallets to be deleted.

    • deletePositions

      public void deletePositions()
      Method that deletes all positions from the database.

    • getPalletesReservedByCustomerWithMaterial

      public List<Pallet> getPalletesReservedByCustomerWithMaterial(int id, String materialName)
      Method that retrieves a list of pallets reserved by a customer with a specific material.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the customer reserving the pallets.
      materialName - The name of the material to check for.
      Returns:
      A list of pallets reserved by the customer with the specified material, or null if an error occurs.
